fullText: A callback function is passed to other functions and executed when a specified event occurs.
NPM is the Node.js package manager that allows developers to share JavaScript code.
A pure function is a self-contained function that returns a value only and has no dependency on its external environment (global variables, side effects).
Modules provide programs with organization and separation of concerns.
To run a javascript program from the command line, type node + the <path to the file> + any expected parameters and press enter.
